content: विच्छिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To cut off, break, tear asunder, divide; यदर्धे विच्छिन्नं भवति कृतसंधानमिव तत् <ls>Ś. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 20</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 96.</ls> {@--2@} To interrupt, break off, terminate, end, destroy, make extinct (as a family); विच्छिद्यमानेऽपि कुले परस्य <ls>Bk. 3. 52</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 74.</ls>
